parallel

Class TimeDelayTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.TimeDelayTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, TaskObject

    public class TimeDelayTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskObject
    defines a TaskObject that causes the executing thread to sleep for a specific amount of time. The main Use-Case for this class is to enforce a sleep period specified in the object constructor, so that the parallel.distributed.PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv server object (or derived one) that will be distributing these tasks to the workers in the network for the purpose of applying a previously set command (set via the setCmd(PDBTExecCmd) method) will not face the risk of choosing the same worker for distributing more than one chunk of these tasks to, which would amount to at least one connected worker not executing the mentioned set command as a result of distributing these tasks in the network.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java
